items.name: St. Patrick's Day
items.desc: The biggest St. Patrick's Day celebration in Rochester!

items.name: St. 'Practice' Day
items.desc: On the 17th of every month, we have an Irish menu, along with drink specials on Guinness, Smithwick, Harp, and Roe & Co Irish whiskey.

items.name: Bingo
items.desc: The last Sunday of every month.

items.name: Whiskey Wednesday
items.desc: Free whiskey tastings on the first Wednesday of every month.

items.name: We have Guinness, Harp, and Smithwick's on draft, along with a rotating selection of other beers!
We carry a wide range of Irish whiskey, including Jameson, Roe & Co, and Lost Irish, along with a wide range of other whiskies and spirits!
Potato Chowdah
items.desc: Cream based chowder with potatoes, bacon, cheddar cheese, onions, carrots, and celery.

items.name: Pub Pretzels
items.desc: Soft pretzel sticks with topped with sea salt and served with your choice of our house made cheese sauce or whole grain mustard.

items.name: Jack's Reuben
items.desc: Corned beef with sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Thousand Island dressing on toasted marble rye served with Irish potatoes.

items.name: Deli Style Reuben
items.desc: Corned beef with creamy coleslaw, Swiss cheese, red onion, and Thousand Island dressing served on toasted marble rye with Irish potatoes.

items.name: Pot Roast Grilled Cheese
items.desc: Braised Certified Angus BeefÂ® pot roast, caramelized onions, American cheese, cheddar jack cheese, and horseraddish sauce on grilled sourdough bread.

items.name: Corned Beef & Cabbage
items.desc: Our famous slow cooked corned beef served with fresh cabbage, carrots, and Irish potatoes.

items.name: Cottage Pie
items.desc: Certified Angus Beef Short Rib, celery, peas, carrots, and onions in a rich Guinness gravy topped with smashed potatoes and cheddar jack cheese.

items.name: Guinness Beef Stew
items.desc: Our signature Certifies Angus Beef sirloin tips served with our house made beef gravy with a wee bit of Guinness, fresh carrots, celery, peas, and onions served over egg noodles.

items.name: Pot Roast Dinner
items.desc: Our slow cooked pot roast topped with our house made Guinness gravy served with Irish potatoes and carrots.
